title: Yoga
description: A relaxing and rejuvenating practice to improve flexibility and mindfulness.
additionalDetails: Perfect for all levels. Includes Hatha, Vinyasa, and Power Yoga.

title: HIIT
description: High-Intensity Interval Training for quick calorie burn and improved stamina.
additionalDetails: A mix of cardio and strength exercises for maximum impact.

title: Zumba
description: A fun and energetic dance workout for all skill levels.
additionalDetails: Features Latin and international music styles.

title: Pilates
description: Core-strengthening exercises to enhance posture and balance.
additionalDetails: Suitable for beginners and advanced practitioners.

title: Spin Class
description: An intense indoor cycling workout for cardio and endurance.
additionalDetails: Experience virtual terrains and live challenges.

title: Strength Training
description: Build muscle and strength with targeted workouts and expert guidance.
additionalDetails: Includes free weights, machines, and bodyweight exercises.
